thread.title: Xiaomi Redmi Note 3 spotted on GFXBench running Android Nougat
thread.title_full: Xiaomi Redmi Note 3 spotted on GFXBench running Android Nougat

title: Xiaomi Redmi Note 3 spotted on GFXBench running Android Nougat
text:
Xiaomi Redmi Note 3 spotted on GFXBench running Android Nougat Xiaomi Redmi Note 3 spotted on GFXBench running Android Nougat By January 30, 2017 “The Nougat update for the Redmi Note 3 appears to be in the pipeline” 
Xiaomi     budget phablet in India, which currently boots Android Marshmallow. The company has already released the preview build of the Android Nougat update for the phone, and had confirmed that a stable build would be rolling out in the coming weeks. Now it appears that the Redmi Note 4’s predecessor, the Redmi Note 3 will also be getting the Nougat update. 
Xiaomi appears to be testing the Android Nougat update for the Redmi Note 3. An alleged Redmi Note 3 has been spotted on GFXBench running Android Nougat. The Android version of the phone mentioned on the benchmarking website is Android 7.1.1 Nougat Xiaomi Edition. However, since some of the specs of the device on GFXBench are different, the news should be taken with a pinch of salt. 
The Xiaomi Redmi Note 3 ( review ) was the company’s blockbuster product of 2016 in India. The phone was launched in the country last year running Android Lollipop, but was updated to Marshmallow last month.
